prompt: Subject: The Woman and The Man sharing a tender goodbye. Context: Outside her cozy apartment building under a vintage golden-glow streetlamp. Action: He walks her to the door, they pause; he gently tucks a loose strand of her hair behind her ear, their eyes lock, and she offers a soft, hesitant smile. Style: Soft, warm cinematic aesthetic with earthy color palette. Composition: Medium two-shot transitioning to intimate close-ups of their faces and hands. Ambiance: Golden lamp light, gentle and introspective mood.
camera_movement: Tracking, dolly in, slight tilt up
